channel.title: <Hyperion> Help with editing objects
channel.description: Alright, so I need a little bit of help, the whole reasoning behind me wanting to do this is for doors, but the objects in game really aren't registered as entities or anything server-sided, so I can't directly add/delete/rotate any objects in-game, all the objects loaded from the cache are stored in a collection that corresponds with the region (I believe), so could I possibly change this to a HashMap possibly, so I can just grab an object with a key? Any help would be appreciated, thanks.

item.title: <Hyperion> Help with editing objects
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

Alright, so I need a little bit of help, the whole reasoning behind me wanting to do this is for doors, but the objects in game really aren’t registered as entities or anything server-sided, so I can’t directly add/delete/rotate any objects in-game, all the objects loaded from the cache are stored in a collection that corresponds with the region (I believe), so could I possibly change this to a HashMap possibly, so I can just grab an object with a key? Any help would be appreciated, thanks.

Read full topic
